TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: Friends, I have truly impactful news. Through the combined efforts of Ditylum, other Dree, and myself, I have completed my translation of the Dree language.

SENNETTI: I will write the translation dictionary here. If I format it correctly, it should enable our staves to automatically translate Dree writing, which should be useful while we all properly learn the language.
OKALIS: This is wonderful, Sennetti! Now we can begin communicating with them in earnest!
AZOLLA: I must agree, this is certain to mark a significant turning point in our communications with the Dree.
NESIA: To complete a translation of this scale so quickly is very impressive, well done Sennetti!
NESIA: Will we even be able to communicate with the Dree via text? They have no eyes.
SENNETTI: Yes, actually. It seems that they are able to detect the differences in the materials via echolocation, allowing them to â€œreadâ€? our writing.
